one.question: This method joins arrays and returns an array with the joined arrays
This method checks whether an object is an array
This property sets or returns the number of elements in an array
This method joins all elements of an array into a string
This method removes the last element of an array, and returns that element
This method adds new elements to the end of an array, and returns the new length
This method reverses the order of the elements in an array
This method sorts the elements of an array
This method converts an array to a string, and returns the result

two.question: This method checks if every element in an array pass a test
This method creates a new array with every element in an array that pass a test
This method check if an array contains the specified element
This method calls a function for each array element
This method searches the array for an element and returns its position
This method creates a new array with the result of calling a function for each array element
This method removes the first element of an array, and returns that element
This method selects a part of an array, and returns the new array

three.question: This method returns the primitive value of an array
This method adds new elements to the beginning of an array, and returns the new length
This method adds/removes elements from an array
This method checks if any of the elements in an array pass a test
This method returns the index of the first element in an array that pass a test
This method returns the value of the first element in an array that pass a test
This method fills the elements in an array with a static value

four.question: This method reduce the values of an array to a single value (going right-to-left)
This method reduce the values of an array to a single value (going left-to-right)
This method creates an array from an object
This method copies array elements within the array, to and from specified positions
This property returns the function that created the Array object's prototype

five.question: This method returns a key/value pair Array Iteration Object
This property allows you to add properties and methods to an Array object
This method returns a Array Iteration Object, containing the keys of the original array
This method searches the array for an element, starting at the end, and returns its position

one.question: The -BLANK- method requests a representation of the specified resource. Requests using -BLANK- should only retrieve data.
The -BLANK- method deletes the specified resource.

two.question: The -BLANK- method submits an entity to the specified resource, often causing a change in state or side effects on the server.

three.question: The -BLANK- method replaces all current representations of the target resource with the request payload.

four.question: The -BLANK- method asks for a response identical to a GET request, but without the response body.

five.question: The -BLANK- method applies partial modifications to a resource.
The -BLANK- method performs a message loop-back test along the path to the target resource.
The -BLANK- method describes the communication options for the target resource.
The -BLANK- method establishes a tunnel to the server identified by the target resource.

one.question: an error when trying to interpret syntactically invalid code

two.question: thrown when trying to pass a value as an argument to a function that does not allow a range that includes the value

three.question: an error when an operation could not be performed, typically (but not exclusively) when a value is not of the expected type

four.question: an error when trying to intan error when a variable that doesn't exist (or hasn't yet been initialized) in the current scope is referenced

five.question: represents an error when a global URI handling function was used in a wrong way

one.question: This query method expects one row or errors out. This query method is db.BLANK()

two.question: This query method expects no rows or results, to be resolved with null. This query method is db.BLANK()

three.question: This query method expects one or more rows. This query method is db.BLANK()

four.question: This query method has no expectations. This query method is db.BLANK()

five.question: This query method returns the raw results, useful for insert, update, and deletes. This query method is db.BLANK()
